function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of literature on the effects of COVID-19 on construction firms","Impact":"Inaccurate assessment of the pandemic's impact on construction firms","Mitigation":"Conduct further research and analysis to gather more comprehensive data","Technologies":"","People":"Researchers, construction firms","Owner":"Research team"},{"Description":"Limited sample size in the research","Impact":"Potential for sampling bias and inaccurate representation of the population","Mitigation":"Expand the sample size to include a more diverse and representative group of building professionals","Technologies":"","People":"Researchers, building professionals","Owner":"Research team"},{"Description":"Use of SPSS 25.0 for data analysis","Impact":"Reliability and accuracy of the analysis may be impacted if the software is not used correctly","Mitigation":"Ensure proper training and expertise in the use of SPSS 25.0, and consider utilizing additional analytical methods for validation","Technologies":"SPSS 25.0, other analytical methods","People":"Researchers, data analysts","Owner":"Research team"}]}
